mapper.sql: id, ucUserId, schoolId, schoolName, location, address, masterName, phone, createDate, creator, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, mqMsgId, mac, isActivated
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_user ( ucUserId, schoolId, schoolName, location, address, masterName, phone, createDate, creator, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, mqMsgId, mac, isActivated ) VALUES ( #{ucUserId}, #{schoolId}, #{schoolName}, #{location}, #{address}, #{masterName}, #{phone}, #{createDate}, #{creator}, #{lastModifier}, #{lastModDate}, #{status}, #{mqMsgId}, #{mac}, #{isActivated} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_user
ucUserId = #{ucUserId},
schoolId = #{schoolId},
schoolName = #{schoolName},
location = #{location},
address = #{address},
masterName = #{masterName},
phone = #{phone},
createDate = #{createDate},
creator = #{creator},
lastModifier = #{lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
status = #{status},
mqMsgId = #{mqMsgId},
mac = #{mac},
isActivated = #{isActivated},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE t_user
ucUserId = #{map.ucUserId},
schoolId = #{map.schoolId},
schoolName = #{map.schoolName},
location = #{map.location},
address = #{map.address},
masterName = #{map.masterName},
phone = #{map.phone},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
creator = #{map.creator},
lastModifier = #{map.lastModifier},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
status = #{map.status},
mqMsgId = #{map.mqMsgId},
mac = #{map.mac},
isActivated = #{map.isActivated},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user ( ucUserId, schoolId, schoolName, location, address, masterName, phone, createDate, creator, lastModifier, lastModDate, status, mqMsgId, mac, isActivated ) VALUES ( #{map.ucUserId}, #{map.schoolId}, #{map.schoolName}, #{map.location}, #{map.address}, #{map.masterName}, #{map.phone}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.creator}, #{map.lastModifier}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.status}, #{map.mqMsgId}, #{map.mac}, #{map.isActivated} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_user
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND ucUserId like CONCAT('%', #{ucUserId} , '%')
AND schoolId like CONCAT('%', #{schoolId} , '%')
AND schoolName like CONCAT('%', #{schoolName} , '%')
AND location like CONCAT('%', #{location} , '%')
AND address like CONCAT('%', #{address} , '%')
AND masterName like CONCAT('%', #{masterName} , '%')
AND phone like CONCAT('%', #{phone} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND creator like CONCAT('%', #{creator} , '%')
AND lastModifier like CONCAT('%', #{lastModifier} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND mqMsgId like CONCAT('%', #{mqMsgId} , '%')
AND mac like CONCAT('%', #{mac} , '%')
AND isActivated like CONCAT('%', #{isActivated} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
